method.name: change_mode_borderless_fullscreen
method.description: Sets the mode to borderless fullscreen, set monitor.

method.name: change_mode_exclusive_fullscreen
method.description: Sets the mode to exclusive fullscreen, set monitor and video mode.

method.name: change_mode_windowed
method.description: Sets the mode to windowed, set monitorÂ and size of a window.

method.name: get_screen_mode_list
method.description: Returns the available video modes for the specified screen by index. If no screen index is provided, the current screen will be used.
